item.description:
Level 2 open to Sea Kayaks and Rec Kayaks 10ft and above due to potential of strong currents

The last in a Wednesday Trilogy of paddling on the Merrimack River kayaking in Newburyport Harbor or the Islands just up river from the Newburyport Bridge. This paddle brings you into coastal waters with potential of boat traffic and currents. Participants in this paddle should have experience as a level 2 kayaker as described on our About Us page Goto the link below to read the kayak skill levels. See the photo above for a view of the area and Launch Site.

NE Seacoast Paddlers Kayaker Skill Levels

Life vests aka PFDs must be worn when paddling with this group

Google Maps directions to Cashman Park Newburyport MA
item.name: Merrimack River at Cashman Park Newburyport MA Paddle
